text.section: A qualified organization shall obtain a written permit from the Department of Environmental Resources before conducting a raffle if the total cash value of the prize exceeds $200.

section.section: Before issuing a permit, the Department of Environmental Resources shall ascertain the character of the qualified organization applying for a permit under this section to determine if the application complies with this subtitle.
A permit issued to a qualified organization to conduct a raffle may not be transferred.

text.section: The permit fee for each raffle is $15.
